channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead fox decomposing and causing massive flies issue, 14th June
item.description:
There is a dead fox in the hedge on the public footpath which is rotting making an awful smell that comes into my house. There are also lots of maggots and flies which are then coming into my house.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harvill Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Man dumping bagged waste at the recycling centre on Boston Place, 14th June
item.description:
I have just witnessed a man empting his car of multiple rubbish bags at the recycling centre on Boston Place he also placed a large garden waste bag in the plastic recycling bin. Please carry out enforcement you have his car number plate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 106, Boston Place, Marylebone, London
